name: Hazel's Audition
description:
This game was made for an OCT called DreamCatcher. The plotline is that people have been falling into a coma and waking up in a magical place called DreamCatcher HQ. There is only one way out and that's to fight in a tournament for a failsafe.

My character Hazel is from a youtube animation I am working on tentatively called Fairy vs Mafia. In that animation she is not okay, DreamCatcherOCT seemed like a good fit for the character so I decided to enter.  I hope to finish the animation soonish and when it is done I hope you will consider checking it out.

I am not sure the game makes sense or is fun divorced from it's context but maybe you should give it a try anyway?

What is an OCT?

An Original Character Tournament is a a elaborate system of trading art where artists enter their original character into a fighting Tournament. They then get paired with another artist and both of them create separate depictions of their battle which is then decided on by judges. 

The entry picked by the judges becomes canon and the artist moves onto the next round until all other artists have been eliminated. This creates a story and is a great way to learn how to do art and make friends.
